welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Liversedge, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside and friendly locals. Get ready to immerse yourself in its beauty and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is primarily used for charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
